function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The use of movable walls and adjustable open plans may increase the risk of airborne disease transmission within the home.","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases among residents.","Mitigation":"Use of antimicrobial building materials, proper ventilation systems, and regular disinfection protocols.","Technologies":"Antimicrobial surfaces, advanced ventilation systems with HEPA filters, UV-C disinfection devices.","People":"Residents, visitors, and household members.","Owner":"Architects, builders, and homeowners."},{"Description":"The aeroponic system on the balcony introduces a potential risk of contamination or spread of plant-borne diseases within the home.","Impact":"Risk of spreading plant-borne diseases to residents and visitors.","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring of plant health, use of disease-resistant plant species, and proper cleaning and maintenance of the aeroponic system.","Technologies":"Plant disease monitoring apps, disease-resistant plant varieties, hydroponic and aeroponic system cleaning devices.","People":"Residents, visitors, and household members.","Owner":"Architects, builders, and homeowners."}]}
